original_title: Cartoon Classics - Vol. 6: 25 Favorite Cartoons - 3 Hours
overview: Enjoy 3 more hours of Classic Cartoons from the Golden Age of Animation. Cartoon characters include Casper the Friendly Ghost, Bugs Bunny, Porky Pig, Daffy Duck, Betty Boop, Popeye, Little Lulu, Herman & Katnip, Mighty Mouse, Superman and many more. Featuring vintage Looney Tunes, Merry Melodies, Happy Harmonies, Max Fleischer cartoons with remastered sound.
title: Cartoon Classics - Vol. 6: 25 Favorite Cartoons - 3 Hours
